name: 'Toy Story': Other Toy Characters Quiz / Test | Movies | 15 Questions

questions.text: Which of the following toys were on podium duty when Woody call a staff meeting?
questions.explanation:
Robot.

	Both Snake and Robot had the duty of assembling the podium for the staff meeting.

questions.text: When the toy soldiers went to reconnoiter Andy's birthday party, one of them gets stepped on by Andy's mom. What piece of equipment was he carrying?
questions.explanation:
metal detector.

	Interesting goof: in most scenes, Sarge is the soldier holding onto binoculars. But when the minesweeper is stepped on, Sarge is holding a pistol. He regains his binoculars when he gets to the plant pot.

questions.text: Who held a meeting on the subject of Plastic Corrosion Awareness?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Spell

	Woody thanks him for holding this meeting during the staff meeting.

questions.text: During the song 'Strange Things', whose hair is Buzz combing?
When Sid 'wins' Buzz and Woody at Pizza Planet, he also has one other toy that he won in his backpack. Which one was it?
questions.explanation:
Little Green Man.

	The first thing Sid did when he got home was give the LGM to his dog Scud to play with.

questions.text: Sid takes which doll of Hannah's when she doesn't answer his question to his liking?
questions.explanation:
Janie.

	He performed one of his 'operations' on her.

questions.text: Which toy does Sid exchange the heads with the doll he took from Hannah?
During Woody's mission to rescue Buzz, what two toys are assigned to ring the doorbell?
questions.explanation:
Ducky and Legs.

	The frog came down the stairs and out the door after Hannah opened it.

questions.text: What toy did Sid blow apart with a firecracker?
questions.explanation:
Combat Carl.

	'Oh, no. It's a Combat Carl.'

questions.text: Who does Woody use to see who Sid is torturing with the firecracker?
questions.explanation:
Lenny.

	Lenny is a wind-up pair of walking binoculars.

questions.text: What toy stood next to Woody during the staff meeting?
questions.explanation:
Mike.

	Mike (short for microphone) was amplifying Woody's voice for the meeting.

questions.text: Who was handing Buzz pieces of tape to fix his ship?
questions.explanation:
Robot.

	Snake was tearing the tape off the dispenser, but Robot was the one directly handing the tape to Buzz.

questions.text: Who was wearing Woody's hat after his night in the toy box?
Who was the first toy to move after Woody signalled an 'all-clear' after Andy took his sister Molly downstairs?
questions.explanation:
RC.

	He peeked out from the closet.

questions.text: Who was being threatened by One-eyed Bart (Potatohead) to be run-over unless the bank's money is surrendered?
questions.explanation:
Sheep.

	'Bart' threatens Bo by pointing out that her sheep were poised to be run over on the Hot Wheels track.
